CURRENT_VERSION.desc: The MediaWiki version with SVN revision if available

MAIN_PAGE.desc: Returns WTitle object for the Main Page

SERVER.desc: The base URL of the server ($wgServer)

SERVER_NAME.desc: The base URL of the server

disableCache.desc: Set a flag in current page indicating that the content is dynamic and shouldn't be cached

cacheExpiry.desc: The number of seconds after which cache of current page should expire

CACHE_TIME.desc: Time when current page was generated

CACHE_TIME_STRING.desc: Time when current page was generated

id.desc: Gets category ID, or false on failure

name.desc: Gets DB key name, or false on failure

title.desc: Gets WTitle of the category, or false on failure

memberCount.desc: Gets total number of member pages and subcategories and files, or false on failure

pageCount.desc: Gets total number of member pages, or false on failure

fileCount.desc: Gets total number of member files, or false on failure

subcatCount.desc: Gets total number of member subcategories, or false on failure

addCategory.desc: Add current page to specified category

defaultSortKey.desc: Current page's default sort key for categories

DEFAULT_SORT_KEY.desc: Deprecated, please use defaultSortKey static property!!!

ACTIVE_USERS.desc: Number of active users, based on the criteria used in Special:Statistics

ADMINS.desc: Number of users in the sysop group

ARTICLES.desc: Number of pages in content namespaces

JOBS.desc: Size of of the job queue

fullUrl.desc: Get a real URL referring to this title

nsNumber.desc: Get ID of the page's namespace

name.desc: Get full page title without the namespace

fullName.desc: Get namespace and full page title

baseName.desc: Get title of the page in the immediately superior subpage level without the namespace ('Title/foo' on 'Help:Title/foo/bar')

rootName.desc: Name of the root of the title. Would return Foo for title Help:Foo/Bar/Baz

subjectNsText.desc: Name of the associated content namespace

subjectNsNumber.desc: ID of the associated content namespace

talkNsText.desc: Name of the associated talk namespace

talkNsNumber.desc: ID of the associated talk namespace

isContentPage.desc: Is this Title in a namespace which contains content?

isMovable.desc: Would anybody with sufficient privileges be able to move this page?

DBKey.desc: Article DB Key (main part of page name with underscores)

NAME.desc: Current page title without the namespace

BASE_NAME.desc: Page title of current page in the immediately superior subpage level without the namespace ('Title/foo' on 'Help:Title/foo/bar')

SUBPAGE_NAME.desc: The subpage title of current page ('bar' on 'Help:Title/foo/bar')

ROOT_NAME.desc: Name of the root of the current page. Would return Foo on page Help:Foo/Bar/Baz

SUBJECT_NS_TEXT.desc: Name of the associated content namespace

SUBJECT_NS_NUMBER.desc: ID of the associated content namespace

TALK_NS_TEXT.desc: Name of the associated talk namespace

TALK_NS_NUMBER.desc: ID of the associated talk namespace

IS_CONTENT_PAGE.desc: Is this Title of current page in a namespace which contains content?

IS_MOVABLE.desc: Would anybody with sufficient privileges be able to move current page?

IS_MAIN_PAGE.desc: Is current page the main page?

DB_KEY.desc: Article DB Key (main part of current page name with underscores)

PHPTAGS_WIKI_VERSION.desc: The current version of the PhpTags Wiki extension as a string
